refnamediv.refpurpose: widget to display RGB or grayscale data.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GtkPreview widget provides a simple interface used to display images as RGB or grayscale data. It's deprecated; just use a GdkPixbuf displayed by a GtkImage, or perhaps a GtkDrawingArea. GtkPreview has no advantage over those approaches.

refsect2.title: struct GtkPreview

warning.para: GtkPreview is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: The GtkPreview-struct struct contains private data only, and should be accessed using the functions below.

refsect2.title: struct GtkPreviewInfo

warning.para: GtkPreviewInfo is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para:
Contains information about global properties of preview widgets.
The GtkPreviewInfo struct contains the following fields. (These fields should be considered read-only. They should never be set by an application.)
GdkVisual *visual; the visual used by all previews.
GdkColormap *cmap; the colormap used by all previews.
gdouble gamma; the gamma correction value used by all previews (See gtk_preview_set_gamma()).

refsect2.title: union GtkDitherInfo

warning.para: GtkDitherInfo is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This union not used in GTK+.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_uninit ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_uninit is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated and does nothing.

warning.para: gtk_preview_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

listitem.simpara: the type data contained by the widget. (Grayscale or RGB)

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_size ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the size that the preview widget will request in response to a "size_request" signal. The drawing area may actually be allocated a size larger than this depending on how it is packed within the enclosing containers. The effect of this is determined by whether the preview is set to expand or not (see gtk_preview_expand())

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_put ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_preview_put (GtkPreview *preview, GdkWindow *window, GdkGC *gc, gint srcx, gint srcy, gint destx, gint desty, gint width, gint height);

warning.para: gtk_preview_put is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Takes a portion of the contents of a preview widget and draws it onto the given drawable, window.

listitem.simpara: The graphics context for the operation. Only the clip mask for this GC matters.
the x coordinate of the upper left corner in the source image.
the y coordinate of the upper left corner in the source image.
the x coordinate of the upper left corner in the destination image.
the y coordinate of the upper left corner in the destination image.
the width of the rectangular portion to draw.
the height of the rectangular portion to draw.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_draw_row ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_preview_draw_row (GtkPreview *preview, guchar *data, gint x, gint y, gint w);

warning.para: gtk_preview_draw_row is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the data for a portion of a row.

listitem.simpara: the new data for the portion. It should contain w bytes of data if the preview is of type GTK_TYPE_GRAYSCALE, and 3*w bytes of data if the preview is of type GTK_TYPE_COLOR.
the starting value on the row to set.
the number of pixels in the row to change.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_set_expand ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_set_expand is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Determines the way that the the preview widget behaves when the size it is allocated is larger than the requested size. If expand is FALSE, then the preview's window and buffer will be no larger than the size set with gtk_preview_size(), and the data set will be centered in the allocation if it is larger. If expand is TRUE then the window and buffer will expand with the allocation; the application is responsible for catching the "size_allocate" signal and providing the data appropriate for this size.

listitem.simpara: whether the preview's window should expand or not.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_set_gamma ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_set_gamma is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the gamma-correction value for all preview widgets. (This function will eventually be replaced with a function that sets a per-preview-widget gamma value). The resulting intensity is given by: destination_value * pow (source_value/255, 1/gamma). The gamma value is applied when the data is set with gtk_preview_draw_row() so changing this value will not affect existing data in preview widgets.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_set_color_cube ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_preview_set_color_cube (guint nred_shades, guint ngreen_shades, guint nblue_shades, guint ngray_shades);

warning.para: gtk_preview_set_color_cube is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated and does nothing. GdkRGB automatically picks an optimium color cube for the display.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_set_install_cmap ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_set_install_cmap is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated and does nothing. GdkRGB will automatically pick a private colormap if it cannot allocate sufficient colors.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_set_reserved ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_set_reserved is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated and does nothing.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_set_dither ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_set_dither is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the dithering mode for the display.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_get_visual ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_get_visual is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the visual used by preview widgets. This function is deprecated, and you should use gdk_rgb_get_visual() instead.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_get_cmap ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_get_cmap is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the colormap used by preview widgets. This function is deprecated, and you should use gdk_rgb_get_cmap() instead.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_get_info ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_get_info is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Return a GtkPreviewInfo structure containing global information about preview widgets.

listitem.simpara: a GtkPreviewInfo structure. The return value belongs to GTK+ and must not be modified or freed.

refsect2.title: gtk_preview_reset ()

warning.para: gtk_preview_reset is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated and does nothing. It was once used for changing the colormap and visual on the fly.

listitem.para: Whether the preview widget should take up the entire space it is allocated.
